sourcesContent:
Beds Collection

Discover our premium collection of comfortable and stylish beds

Best Sellers Premium Quality Free Shipping*
Loading...

Loading beds collection...

Error! {{ error }}
{{ bed.discount || (calculateDiscount(bed) + '% OFF') }}
Assured {{ bed.badge }}
{{ bed.quantity > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock' }}
Express {{ bed.shipping.includes('Express') ? '' : bed.shipping }}
{{ bed.brand }}
{{ (bed.name || bed.title | slice:0:50) }} {{ (bed.name || bed.title).length > 50 ? '...' : '' }}

{{ bed.description.length > 80 ? (bed.description | slice:0:80) + '...' : bed.description }}

{{ bed.rating }} ({{ bed.rating === '5' ? '500+' : '250+' }} reviews)
{{ bed.price }} ₹{{ bed.originalPrice | number }}
Save ₹{{ calculateSavings(bed) | number }}
{{ bed.emi }}
Available: {{ bed.quantity }} Max: {{ bed.maxQuantity }}

No Beds Available

We're currently updating our beds collection. Please check back soon!

// beds.component.ts import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Bed } from '../../Model/items/BedDO'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; // Add this import @Component({ selector: 'app-beds', templateUrl: './beds.component.html', styleUrls: ['./beds.component.css'] }) export class BedsComponent implements OnInit { beds: Bed[] = []; loading: boolean = false; error: string | null = null; constructor(private router: Router) { } // Inject Router ngOnInit(): void { this.loadBeds(); } loadBeds(): void { this.loading = true; // Simulate API delay setTimeout(() => { try { this.beds = [ { id: 1, name: 'Luxurious Solid Wood Queen Size Bed in Brown Finish', title: 'Luxurious Solid Wood Queen Size Bed in Brown Finish', brand: 'By Nilkamal Sleep', rating: '5', price: '₹22,912', originalPrice: 42000, // Converted to number for calculations discount: '(45% off)', emi: 'EMI starting from ₹1,101/month', shipping: 'Ships in 4 days', badge: 'Best Seller', description: 'Premium solid wood queen size bed with storage and elegant brown finish. Perfect for modern bedrooms.', imageUrl: 'https://ii1.pepperfry.com/media/catalog/product/l/u/1100x1210/lush-deluxe-queen-size-upholstered-bed-in-pastel-grey---white-colour-with-box-storage-lush-deluxe-qu-owpeym.jpg', quantity: 15, maxQuantity: 2 }, { id: 2, name: 'Hoshi Queen Size Bed with Box Storage', title: 'Hoshi Queen Size Bed with Box Storage and Headboard Storage in Wenge Finish', brand: 'By Mintwud from Pepperfry', rating: '5', price: '₹16,999', originalPrice: 25186, discount: '(33% off)', emi: 'EMI starting from ₹817/month', shipping: 'Express Shipping in 1 day', description: 'Modern Hoshi bed with box storage and headboard storage in elegant wenge finish.', imageUrl: 'https://ii1.pepperfry.com/media/catalog/product/n/a/1100x1210/namie-queen-size-bed-in-wenge-colour-with-box-storage-namie-queen-size-bed-in-wenge-colour-with-box--elkpaq.jpg', quantity: 8, maxQuantity: 3 }, { id: 3, name: 'Elevate Queen Size Bed in Classic Oak', title: 'Elevate Queen Size Bed in Classic Oak Melamine Finish', brand: 'By Spacewood', rating: '4.5', price: '₹23,999', originalPrice: 40176, discount: '(40% off)', emi: 'EMI starting from ₹1,153/month', description: 'Elevate series queen size bed with classic oak melamine finish and sturdy construction.', imageUrl: 'https://ii1.pepperfry.com/media/catalog/product/s/e/1100x1210/segur-sheesham-wood-king-size-bed-in-provincial-teak-finish-with-hydraulic-storage-segur-sheesham-wo-scycux.jpg', quantity: 0, maxQuantity: 2 }, { id: 4, name: 'Uttara Sheesham Wood King Size Bed', title: 'Uttara Sheesham Wood King Size Bed In Scratch Resistant Honey Oak Finish', brand: 'By Mudramark from Pepperfry', rating: '4.5', price: '₹27,999', originalPrice: 38999, discount: '(28% off)', emi: 'EMI starting from ₹1,345/month', shipping: 'Express Shipping in 1 day', assured: true, description: 'Premium Sheesham wood king size bed with scratch resistant honey oak finish and box storage.', imageUrl: 'https://ii1.pepperfry.com/media/catalog/product/k/o/1100x1210/kosmo-jude-king-size-bed-in-sheesham-finish-with-box-storage-kosmo-jude-king-size-bed-in-sheesham-fi-mot2tk.jpg', quantity: 5, maxQuantity: 1 }, { id: 5, name: 'Luxury Queen Bed with Hydraulic Storage', title: 'Luxury Queen Bed with Hydraulic Storage in Pastel Grey', brand: 'By Woodsworth', rating: '4.8', price: '₹34,999', originalPrice: 48999, discount: '(29% off)', emi: 'EMI starting from ₹1,682/month', shipping: 'Ships in 3 days', badge: 'Premium', description: 'Luxury queen bed with hydraulic storage, premium upholstery, and elegant pastel grey finish.', imageUrl: 'https://ii1.pepperfry.com/media/catalog/product/e/v/1100x1210/eva-sheesham-wood-queen-size-bed-in-honey-oak-finish-eva-sheesham-wood-queen-size-bed-in-honey-oak-f-pvhkmy.jpg', quantity: 12, maxQuantity: 2 }, { id: 6, name: 'Modern Single Bed with Trundle', title: 'Modern Single Bed with Trundle in Provincial Teak Finish', brand: 'By Woodsworth', rating: '4.3', price: '₹14,999', originalPrice: 21999, discount: '(32% off)', emi: 'EMI starting from ₹721/month', shipping: 'Express Shipping in 1 day', description: 'Space-saving single bed with trundle for extra sleeping space, perfect for kids rooms.', imageUrl: 'https://ii1.pepperfry.com/media/catalog/product/e/v/1100x1210/eva-solid-wood-single-bed-with-trundle-in-provincial-teak-finish-by-woodsworth-eva-solid-wood-single-lqnuzm.jpg', quantity: 20, maxQuantity: 4 } ]; this.loading = false; } catch (error) { this.error = 'Failed to load beds. Please try again later.'; this.loading = false; console.error('Error loading beds:', error); } }, 1000); } // Method to navigate to checkout page checkOutPage(bed: Bed): void { // Navigate to checkout page with bed data this.router.navigate(['/checkout'], { state: { product: bed } }); // Or navigate to product detail page // this.router.navigate(['/beds', bed.id]); } // Helper method to extract numeric price extractPrice(priceString: string): number { if (!priceString) return 0; return parseInt(priceString.replace(/[^0-9]/g, '')) || 0; } // Calculate discount percentage calculateDiscount(bed: Bed): number { if (!bed.price || !bed.originalPrice) return 0; const currentPrice = this.extractPrice(bed.price); const originalPrice = bed.originalPrice; if (originalPrice > 0 && currentPrice > 0) { return Math.round(((originalPrice - currentPrice) / originalPrice) * 100); } return 0; } // Calculate savings calculateSavings(bed: Bed): number { if (!bed.price || !bed.originalPrice) return 0; const currentPrice = this.extractPrice(bed.price); return bed.originalPrice - currentPrice; } }
